website_summaries.verdict: This weight management dog food comes with some desirable features; but some others on our list offer similar results and better ingredients.
pros: Formulated with quality chicken protein for optimal flavor
The addition of fiber and prebiotics aids digestion, which is beneficial for dogs with sensitive digestive systems
Many owners are pleased with how well their dogs eat it and the weight loss as a result
cons: Contains corn as the number one ingredient and has by-products
Some owners voiced concern about formula changes

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful in weight control.
customer_reviews.text: This is thee best weight control dog food I've finally gotten ahold of. I have 2 doberman and 3 min pins. 1 doberman needs weight control especially after she got spade. She gained about 15-20 pounds. And 2 of my 3 min pins are overweight because they too have been fixed. My doberman lost a large amount of weight a few months ago so I thought she'd be ok. So I put her back on the Rachel Ray they were all on. BAD IDEA...bought this again for my overweight pups and keep the other 2 on Rachel Ray by separating them while eating. They really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kaltenbach

customer_reviews.title: Bulldog having diarrhea and blood in stool
customer_reviews.text: Within a week of giving this to our bulldog, he has had diarrhea and what looks like blood in his stool. This is the only thing that has changed in his diet and he’s never had diarrhea on Royal or When we switched to Iams Proactive Health for bulldogs (different packing from this one—not sure if this one has new ingredients in it). We had to switch back to Royal because of this.
customer_reviews.author: euniscus

customer_reviews.title: I use their cat food and love it. Dog food
customer_reviews.text: I would not use this again. Within two weeks of switching to this, my dog had two big sebaceous cysts that she's never gotten before and started getting that gross white film on her coat. Using the feeding recommendations on the bag, she actually gained weight. After I switched to another brand, cysts went away and her coat started improving, along with her shedding. I use their cat food and love it. Dog food, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient to have dog food delivered right to my door.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Iam's Weight Control for my 4 dogs for several years, but the stores where I bought it didn't always have it in stock. I ended up having to buy other Iam's formulas. My westie has recently been diagnosed with diabetes, so I have to keep her food consistent. It is nice to have the food delivered right to my door instead of running all over town looking for the Weight Control formula. And the cost is less than if I bought it in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: I have used the IAMS Healthy Weight for many years. Helps with weight control on older dogs or spay/nuetered dogs. My dogs have always loved it and they have had relatively excellent health on it well into their older age (12-17 yrs...and I have a large breed). Vet is very pleased with their annual bloodwork. The larger size bag has become hard to locate in local stores. Don’t know why- it’s for “large dogs”. Large dogs eat more. Do they think I want to run to the store every 3-4 days to buy dog food? I feed with very little water in their food which also helps with keeping their teeth clean.
customer_reviews.author: P E

customer_reviews.title: OUR SUMMER LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several different brands of dog food, including pricy ones found only in pet stores, and this one has been the best for her overall health and she is finally losing a little weight. She walks a minimum of 3 miles a day and although her former food was supposed to be light or lower calorie she didn't lose anything. Her stools have been normal since day one on Iams, so that was another plus. Happy I decided to try Iams.
customer_reviews.author: D. Catellier

customer_reviews.title: No complaints from my dog
customer_reviews.text: Not a surprise that my dog was put on a diet since she is such a beggar when it comes to food. The price for the food on Amazon was better for the amount of the food than Walmart was, plus it's nice to have it delivered to my house and not have to lug it to my car and then inside my house from a store. The pieces are bigger than I expected, but my dog seems to have no issue with the taste, size of the pieces, or that he bowl is not as full as it would be if the pieces were smaller. Overall, we both seem to be happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ always a trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an excellent value versus buying this in the store. During quarantine there was no place open to purchase any dog food / cat food. When things begin to open up there was no cat food or dog food available. So I was able to order the exact same type for my dog and it was at least 5 to $8 cheaper buying this on Amazon. My Gracie has been on this for about a year and it has really helped her in a healthy way she really loves the flavor and I really love the quality of the ingredients. I've always trusted this brand ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Package size larger than store size - Better value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect food for our newly adopted chubby beagle. She's been on it for over a month now and done to her target weight - 25 lbs. No allergic reactions. Shipping is scheduled via Amazon to arrive about 7 weeks. This is a great feature. Pricing is competitive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picky, Overweight Dog Eats It!
customer_reviews.text: Our vet told us (Pepper, my dog, and I) Pepper needs to lose about 10 pounds, not counting her fur (she's a rescue and was so matted she had to be shaved). And sure enough, once she was shaved, it's obvious she's overweight (previous owner, second one, was neglectful, and used a gravity feeder). This was the only one I could afford. It has only had it about ten days, so I don't see any difference yet. But, she eats it!
customer_reviews.author: MadeupaginTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for Eukanuba Weight Control
customer_reviews.text: My pug had been eating Eukanuba Adult Weight Control for many, many years. It was discontinued recently and replaced by "Fit Body." Fit Body and my pug's digestive system didn't get along, if you get the drift. The ingredients in Iams Proactive Health is fairly similar to Eukanuba weight control and my pug adjusted fine to Iams. Give it a try if you find that Fit Body doesn't work for your dog.
customer_reviews.author: KenSW

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves this dog food.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this dog food. It's a premium brand, made in Wisconsin. That means to Chinese-made fillers additive, or ingredients. You may remember the big scandal about some Chinese manufacturers selling US companies ingredients that were suppose to be real meat but weren't. Iam's does not out-source ingredients to foreign countries. 'Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Bombastus64

customer_reviews.title: I like the healthy weight Iams.  My dog seems to love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 pound Papillon got up to 8.9 pounds eating regular iambs dog food, so I bought the healthy weight version and cut the food back a bit. I bought a baby scale and she is now down to her ideal weight and I’m adding in small amounts of fruits and vegetables that are recommended for dogs. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BBP Household

customer_reviews.title: My lab loves it
customer_reviews.text: We use to feed him Science Diet, but due to finances had to get something not as pricey. The downside of it is that he no longer has a nice shiny soft coat that he use to have on Science Diet. BUT that's not the biggest concern. Health and flavor! He eats it and stays a decent weight!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it and it has helped him lose weight
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoys this, and it has helped him lose a few pounds because he had gotten a few pounds overweight. I never knew to look at the calorie content of my dog’s food, and his prior food was double what he should have been getting. This food has the amount my vet recommended and has helped him to lose the weight he needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Messner

customer_reviews.title: This dog food will make your dog sick!
customer_reviews.text: This dog food made both my dogs have severe intestinal problems!! They both have been vomiting and had severe diarrhea after switching to IMS from a different dry dog food! After switching them slowly to this dog food they both had to go to the Vet. She told me to take them off this food immediately!!! Wasted 3/4 of the IMS food and switched back to Blue Buffalo! No refund from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Marc smith

customer_reviews.title: Did not get work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for my dog. He would become very itchy and irritable 15-30mins after eating. Whining, Biting his paws, scratching his coat and ears very hard.
customer_reviews.author: kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Who else tasted this dog food...
customer_reviews.text: I find myself wondering who answers the “flavor” rating honestly. Don’t lie, some of you tried to eat this dog food... that’s just weird. Even if you can really taste the chicken. But that’s neither here nor there. My dogs eats it, even if she licks her own butt.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to dog food my pomeranian is picky and that's why we ended up giving him some of our big breed dog's food that he liked. Between that and snacks I think that's why he gained so fast. I am happy I found this food. I received it today and he loves it! He was begging for more like it was a treat. After this big I will have to order a large bag.
customer_reviews.author: ashley liguori

customer_reviews.title: the large breed weight control is a perfect match. It gets harder to keep weight off ...
customer_reviews.text: With seven slowly aging basset hounds, the large breed weight control is a perfect match. It gets harder to keep weight off the butterballs, and with reasonable excersize, they thrive without undue stress on their long, low spinal column. And, being hounds, they eat it readily, without extra encouragment. It also contains the complete nutrition requirements, with no fake color, or flavoring, a big problem with skin allergies if they are so prone.
customer_reviews.author: Buckshot

customer_reviews.title: Our Lab LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: Following feeding guidelines on bag has made a huge difference to our Chocolate Labs weight and overall energy level. Our Ally girl seems to love this food and will sometimes choose this over some scraps. She has lost weight and her energy level is back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: PaSoccerDad

customer_reviews.title: Great Food - Dog LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoys this food. I love that it comes directly to my door. I don't have to carry a heavy bag from the store shelf, to my cart, to my car. Delivery is the way to go, doesn't get much better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa K.

customer_reviews.title: All dogs got sick
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Iams for years but this batch made all my dog sick to a point where all 5 dogs had to go to the vet and I had to throw the whole bag away. Guess I won't buy dog food from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves Iams dry dog foods. It's a good quality dog food, and my dog looks healthy, and he is a happy dog......If my dog is happy.....then that makes me happy too!! I'm going to stick with Iams dog foods!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like it, but even using the feeding guidelines on the bag my dogs haven't lost weight. They like the food thigh and haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: DCWatcher

customer_reviews.title: Helped dogs health
customer_reviews.text: Dog has Pancreatitis cant digest fat had to go on a all wheat diet. Less than 5% fat..came close to dying After meds and diet doing great.. This food was reccomend by Vet
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Kime

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: This made one of my dogs so sick.... I even after I switch foods it took 3 days for him to stop throwing up! Idk if it’s just the batch or the actual food but buyers beware! My other dog wouldn’t even eat it....
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Switched from grain free
customer_reviews.text: We have a hefty golden retriever. She’s a picky eater, and easily gets an upset stomach. This is gentle enough on her tummy, and since March she has dropped ten pounds!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not doggie approved
customer_reviews.text: My dogs would not eat this!!! It sat in their bowl!! On the third day I had to moisten it just so they would eat something.
customer_reviews.author: Lee H

customer_reviews.title: heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I don't have to haul it into a shopping basket & haul it for someone to scan it.. its right at my door- I can pick the date of when I want it :):) happy customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rottweiler did not like it.
customer_reviews.text: We mixed it with his Eukanuba and he was able to spit out the pieces of Iams. He did not like it and we had to swtich back to Eukanuba.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight J. Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for great quality dog food
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Received a great discount for enrolling in a subscription. My chiwee is overweight so I'm starting her on a diet and I saw this healthy IAMS food. I know IAMS is a very good quality dog food and with the good deal on the price for the subscription there's no way I could wrong. So far she loves the flavor 😁. We will see if she loses some weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: My dog, Mia eats it
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 20 lbs overweight. I changed her dry food and she eats it. I don't know if it has made a difference with her weight.
customer_reviews.author: Dedicated Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My fat baby is doing better now.  My vet recommended this food specifically
customer_reviews.text: My Dane was chubby. We were able to use this food and now she is back to a healthy weight. Personally I think the food taste was not great but my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lett

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food
customer_reviews.text: The reason I buy this dog food is my dog loves it. She is 12 years old and the food is low calorie for weight control.
customer_reviews.author: tallrock75

customer_reviews.title: Good quality dog food
customer_reviews.text: While my black lab loves this, and needs a lower calorie food. But it gives him smelly farts! 😳😉
customer_reviews.author: High Country Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Dogs r happy.
customer_reviews.text: I like this with a sauce Bernaise and a side jof cauliflower florets. It pairs nicely with a Merlot.
customer_reviews.author: Angry but not Lewis Black angry

customer_reviews.title: High quality My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and it has my vet's seal of approval. I've never tasted it so cannot rate the flavor 😃
customer_reviews.author: Developer

customer_reviews.title: A great deal
customer_reviews.text: My dog thrives on this and it seems to control her weight. She is 65 pounds and has not gained any weight since we put her on this 6 months ago. The convienence of free shipping and a Lower price than Walmart cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Liebson

customer_reviews.title: Have been using it for more than 20 years.
customer_reviews.text: Works/worked fine for my beagles. My German Shepherd mix also likes it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this, its a very reasonable price for quality food. It has helped my dogs lose weight better then expensive brands

customer_reviews.title: The food itself seemed fine, but my dog refuses to eat it
customer_reviews.text: The food itself seemed fine, but my dog refuses to eat it. I had to switch back to his previous dry food, and am going to donate the rest of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Veritaserum13

customer_reviews.title: They eat it and don't comolain
customer_reviews.text: quality is mediocre, price is too high....but soo many people will pay these prices, rather than have to go somewhere else......whatever 3 stars is all it will get based on cost

customer_reviews.title: Jack & Annie like it
customer_reviews.text: Both dogs like it and say the flavor is great, but the dogs daddy says all dog food is too expensive!! So, whatever makes them happy....
customer_reviews.author: Randy Indy

customer_reviews.title: My wife put me and my fat dogs on a ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife put me and my fat dogs on a diet. This is what the dogs are eating now and they look to have lost some weight over the last two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: My dog sure loved it
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rate the flavor🤪 but my dog(pit bull) sure loved it. Minor stool change when switching to this brand; no issues.
customer_reviews.author: xxEAGLEWOLFxx

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food !!! But this is to who ever does the getting the food put into a box and taping it... it needs to be done better ( Taping ) My box was wide open when it arrived today.

customer_reviews.title: Good, Standard Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Took my dog longer than usual go warm up to this food. Now she's stands at the bowl waiting for more...

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it, so do I!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love them and are getting more fit. They also seem to be more alert Will continie this food. No issues Thanks!!

customer_reviews.title: Love My IAMS
customer_reviews.text: I love IAMS! My dogs are so healthy,and it must be the IAMS because all they eat is IAMS. Their coats are shiny and soft, their eyes shine and they have more energy than they should sometimes.....making life more interesting for sure. IAMS is well worth the price when you consider that it keeps your doggies healthy and improves their lives.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have five dogs and they all love this! It’s been a staple in our house for years!

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for a diet change for my two dogs and they love it, came right on time and will purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: exclusive choice for our dogs
customer_reviews.text: We feed our dogs this exclusively. We appreciate the regular and timely shipments and never have to worry about our dogs missing a meal.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I hate buying dog food and bugging it home. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: though we're much better now about not giving her too many table scraps
customer_reviews.text: The dog likes Iams. She's had some digestive problems in the past that might have been caused by other brands, though we're much better now about not giving her too many table scraps. We also store the food in an air tight container.

customer_reviews.text: greatest buy for our loved one 🐕‍🦺 as she loves this food and has lost 10-15lbs! Dr. Says she looks great and healthy! 🥰🙏

customer_reviews.title: mold in dog food-

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. We have two Golden Retriever mixes who are ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. We have two Golden Retriever mixes who are 3 years old and they hate this stuff. Anyone with big dogs knows they eat virtually anything. When we go to feed the dogs, they literally walk away from their bowl now. They have been vomiting and have diarrhea so bad that they have been having accidents even immediately after they have been taken out and gone to the bathroom. We are immediately switching back to Taste of the Wild. I've never had such a horrible experience with dog food. I'd give this zero stars if I could.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only food I've found that helps my pup lose weight and he loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Iams Proactive Health Adult Dry Dog Food for Healthy Weight - Chicken
product_meta.description: Style:Adult| Size:29.1 lb.IAMS ProActive Health Healthy Weight Dog Food is veterinarian recommended and made with real ingredients. Our recipe includes farm-raised chicken and wholesome grains and veggies. It’s formulated with essential nutrients and carbohydrates, giving your dog healthy energy to play, and with L-Carnitine, to help gradually return your dog to a healthier weight. Plus, our quality, easily digestible ingredients provide your dog with healthy skin, coat, and metabolism, and strong bones. Look for the IAMS difference.
feature_bullets: Contains one (1) 29.1 lb. bag of IAMS PROACTIVE HEALTH Adult Healthy Weight Dry Dog Food Chicken
Veterinarians recommend IAMS... we’ve got your dog’s diet down to a science
20% less fat vs. IAMS Chunks recipe to help with healthy weight management and control
Promotes strong muscles with premium-quality lean protein
Tailored blend of wholesome fiber and natural prebiotics for healthy digestion
